meaningMnemonic: The part of the <radical>grain</radical> people <radical>favor</radical> the most is the <kanji>head of the plant</kanji>. You don't eat the stems and leaves of rice or wheat plants, right? You eat the head where the grains are.
readingMnemonic: When you want to harvest the <kanji>head of the plant</kanji> you'd like to eat, you need to use a <reading>hoe</reading> (ほ). Using a hoe, you can dig up the bottom of the plant without injuring the head.
